title: Five-Star Spanish Wine Country Escape with Gourmet Inclusions
description: Only an hour and a half from Barcelona, the boutique, adults-only Hotel Terra Dominicata sits in the heart of Montsant Natural Park and the Priorat vineyards, at the foot of a spectacular mountain range, surrounded by lush green landscape, rolling vineyards and serene silence. Enjoy a five-star gourmet escape with daily breakfast, welcome drink with tapas for two and a wine tasting at the gorgeous on-site winery.
offer_address: Carretera, T-702, Km 13, 43379 Escaladei, Tarragona, Spain
